errors.pattern: SessionNotCreatedException|session could not be created|Unable to create.*session

solutions.code:
appium driver install uiautomator2
# or for iOS:
appium driver install xcuitest

adb devices  # Android
idevice_id -l  # iOS

errors.pattern: NoSuchElementException|no such element|element could not be located
errors.cause: Locator doesn't match any visible element

solutions.code:
# Launch Appium Inspector
# Connect and inspect actual hierarchy
# Get correct locator strategy

const el = await driver.$("~accessibilityId");
await el.waitForDisplayed({ timeout: 10000 });

// Try these strategies:
driver.$('~accessibilityId')  // Accessibility ID
driver.$('android=new UiSelector().text("Login")')  // Android
driver.$('-ios class chain:**/XCUIElementTypeButton[`name == "Login"`]')  // iOS

errors.pattern: StaleElementReferenceException|stale element|element is no longer valid
errors.cause: Page changed after element was found

errors.pattern: InvalidSelectorException|invalid selector|locator strategy .* is not supported
errors.cause: Using wrong selector syntax for platform

errors.pattern: app.*not installed|Package .* not found|Could not find app
errors.cause: App package not found on device

solutions.code:
adb install path/to/app.apk  # Android
ideviceinstaller -i path/to/app.ipa  # iOS

adb shell pm list packages | grep example
# Get exact package name

errors.pattern: driver.*not found|No installed driver|Could not find.*driver

solutions.code: appium driver list --installed

# For Android:
appium driver install uiautomator2

# For iOS:
appium driver install xcuitest

# For Mac:
appium driver install mac2
appium driver update uiautomator2

errors.cause: Can't switch to or find WebView context

solutions.code:
const contexts = await driver.getContexts();
console.log(contexts);  // ['NATIVE_APP', 'WEBVIEW_com.app']

errors.pattern: adb.*error|ADB server|daemon not running|cannot connect to daemon

solutions.code:
adb kill-server
adb start-server

# On device:
# Settings > Developer options > USB debugging: ON

# On device:
# Settings > Developer options > Revoke USB debugging authorizations
# Then reconnect and accept prompt

errors.message: iOS code signing or Xcode error

solutions.code:
cd ~/.appium/node_modules/appium-xcuitest-driver/node_modules/appium-webdriveragent
xcodebuild -project WebDriverAgent.xcodeproj -scheme WebDriverAgentRunner -destination 'id=DEVICE_UDID' test

errors.cause: Keyboard not visible or can't send keys

solutions.code:
const field = await driver.$('~inputField');
await field.setValue('text to type');
await driver.hideKeyboard();
adb shell pm grant com.example.app android.permission.CAMERA
